com.swopteam07.tablr.model

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swopteam07.tablr.model.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Provides an API with which to manipulate elements in the domain model.

      • isValidTableName

        public boolean isValidTableName(int tableId,
                                java.lang.String name)
        Check if a string is a valid updated table name for the given table.
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the table for which to check the name.
        name - The new name of the table.
        Returns:
        True of the name isn't empty and in is not in use by any table other than the given one.

      • isValidBlanksAllowed

        public boolean isValidBlanksAllowed(int tableId,
                                    java.lang.Integer colId,
                                    boolean blanksAllowed)
        Checks if the BlanksAllowed value is valid for the given column
        Parameters:
        tableId - The id of the table for which to check.
        colId - The id of the column for which to check.
        blanksAllowed - The new blanks allowed value.
        Returns:

            if(blanksAllowed == false) Column(colId).hasNoNulls();
            if(blanksAllowed==true) true;
